document.full_text: st. louis' main airport was closed for business saturday while crews cleaned up after a tornado tore through a terminal, causing several injuries and sending people scurrying for shelter as plated glass shattered around them.
document.title: apparent tornado causes injuries at st. louis airport
lines_and_colors: st. louis' main airport was closed for business saturday while crews cleaned up after a tornado tore through a terminal, causing several injuries and sending people scurrying for shelter as plated glass shattered around them.
